Reviews.Title: “Weekend Break in Amsterdam”
Reviews.Author: Janice M
Reviews.Content: amsterdam weekend break 23rd 26th march 2012 booked accommodation hotel europa 92 getting airport easy fast caught taxi cost total staff welcoming helpful whatever hotel clean lovely backyard perfect relaxing time stayed bb continental breakfast breakfast choice buffet toast cereal orange juice coffee machine cheese types fruits etc furniture little outdated refurbishing beds extremely comfortable spacious bathroomthe rest hotel condition hotel situated close vondelpark thanks advice receptionist enjoyed walking heineken experience dam madame tussauds overall pleased hotel offered prices reasonable definitely reconsider trip

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel!”
Reviews.Author: Scott A
Reviews.Content: stayed europa december 2011 rates fantastic clean staff super helpful location amazing 5 star hotel definantly worthy poor ratings received plenty breakfast available pot coffee highlight morning drinks bar reasonably priced stay return 2012

Reviews.Title: “Good location - Terrible hotel”
Reviews.Author: jojobead2001
Reviews.Content: redeeming quality location hotel dump size walkin closet bed extremely uncomfortable tv size smart phone odour cigarette smoke unforgiving question fresh meats cheeses morning breakfast hotel staff friendly overnight shift complete jerk rude happened earlier trip switched hotels incident stay else

Reviews.Title: “aussie holiday”
Reviews.Author: rob228
Reviews.Content: booked smelly dirty carpets stained bed lumpy cheap pillows curtains ripped filthy dirty stank cigarette smoke soap shower tea coffee stand moved clean western hotel corner

Reviews.Title: “Average at best, not great value for money”
Reviews.Author: Jenfold
Reviews.Content: stayed amsterdam half marathon guess clean hot water intermittent 13 miles triple hotel triple 3 separate beds definite hostel feel hotel prices positives close tram stop 15 minutes central station close vondelpark lovely wouldnt stay

Reviews.Title: “Disappointing”
Reviews.Author: travelfiend_30
Reviews.Content: hotel decent location excellent claimed decent fast 10 min walk leidseplein 3 mins claim family ran hotel claimed unless turkish family age se dont claim hotel tiny clean phone written buttons impossible call reception finally phone call couldnt bothered walk receptionist didnt dial 04 beds dont look actually pretty comfortable noise level sit pretty main street staff ok didnt decided wake call day 9am ready check 11 cant set own alarm wake call thanks ruining nights sleep

Reviews.Title: “For Amsterdam - Good Hotel that has a decent triple”
Reviews.Author: BCollyer
Reviews.Content: stayed triple courtyard 1 safe computer rent key 2 ac courtyard door cracked cool evening sleeping 3 wifi internet unless rent 24 hour card pass 4 staff helpful outstanding 5 safe 6 hear noise sleeping 7 breakfast typical europe fancy 8 clean serviced everyday 10 minute walk main unsafe walk 9 grocery store internet cafe near 10 1 tram stop near stay depending price

Reviews.Title: “Weekend in Amsterdam”
Reviews.Author: merseytripper
Reviews.Content: value money hotel excellent breakfast easy links sights amsterdam 1 tram central station goes leidseplein stop hotel 20 yards tram stop hotel 10 minutes walk museum square reception staff excellent helpful excellent choice short break suggest 24 48 72 96 hour pass public transport amsterdam easiest buy tourist information schipol airport pass amsterdam schipol airport

Reviews.Author: MNemo07
Reviews.Content: quiet garden receptionist invites friends talk loud 1h30 morning close stairs isolated outside ac 2 pipes continuously driving hot liquid mold shower joints flush try times mirror broken corner walls repainted breakfast cheap ive hotel 1 star ones coffe absolutely disgusting receptionists nice anyway beeing sufficient 3 stars hotel offer 2 stars 1 star finally changed leidse square hotel 4day conference stay amsterdam 4 days comparison

Reviews.Title: “Not fancy, but good value”
Reviews.Author: JoanP60615
Reviews.Content: easy near city center hotel fancy excellent value wasnt expecting else public lobby bar breakfast decorated kept hallways lovely garden lobby bar unfortunately weather didnt lend sitting outside odd building thrown numbering system idiosyncratic lots steps difficulty stairs didnt bother running joke friends stayed breakfast included rate hotel endeared simple act europe airspace shut due volcanic activity flight cancelled spending extra nights amsterdam booked europa time advance via internet received low rate honored additional nights didnt charge breakfasts extra days additionally laptop checked status offered hotels computer check email nice indeed
